Grid Module¶

Core Grid Class¶

Creating a Grid¶

from pyflow_acdc import Grid
grid = Grid()

Node Functions¶

add_node_AC¶

grid.add_node_AC(name='bus1', Vb=400)
Parameters:

  • name (str): Name of the node

  • Vb (float): Base voltage in kV
